amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Sec. 505, relating to domestic release of the Voice of America film entitled "A Fateful Harvest".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in part C of House Report 111-143 to strike Sec. 505, domestic release of the Voice of America film entitled 'A Fateful Harvest'.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 254 (Roll no. 324).
